Module roborally
Package client.view

Class ChatController

java.lang.Object
client.view.Controller
client.view.ChatController
public class ChatController
extends Controller
This method represents the chat for chatting with other players and direct chatting.
Author:
sarah

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private com.jfoenix.controls.JFXTextArea chatWindow
    The textArea where the whole chat history gets displayed.
    private com.jfoenix.controls.JFXComboBox<java.lang.String> directChoiceBox
    The choiceBox where the user can choose if the message should be a direct message and who should be the receiver of the message (one or all).
    private static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger  
    private com.jfoenix.controls.JFXTextField messageField
    The TextField which reads the message the player typed.
    private boolean privateToMe
    It shows if the current message is a direct message to the player itself, then the player won't see a [You] message, because he will receive it from the server and then display it.

    Fields inherited from class client.view.Controller

    cardFormat, robotNames, viewClient, viewManager

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ChatController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addUser​(Player player)
    This method displays an user who joined to the lobby with its chosen robot, name and also the name is added to the choiceBox so that other users in lobby can send direct messages.
    private void checkMessage​(java.lang.String message)
    This message checks whether the typed message is either #emptySpam or #damageDecks or #damage x, depending to this it calls messages that change things on the client side.
    void initialize()
    In this method the directBox gets initialized and the chat controller gets assigned to viewClient.
    void receivedChat​(ReceivedChat receivedChat)
    This message displays a received message depending if it is direct or not in the chatWindow.
    private void resetFocus()
    This method resets the focus onto the infoLabel if the current controller is LobbyController or to the boardPane if current controller is GameController.# It gets called if the focus is set on the textField or textArea and the user clicks Enter.
    void setTextArea​(java.lang.String messageBody)
    The messages received from other users are printed in the chatTextArea and make a new line.
    private void submitChatMessage()
    This message gets called when the user presses enter, it reads the receiver (all or one person) from the comboBox and the message which gets filtered for instructions and everything gets send as the JSONMessage SendChat.

    Methods inherited from class client.view.Controller

    displayingTime, extractCardType, generateImageView, getProgrammingImageView, getRegisterPosition, getWasFormerRegister, setProgrammingImageView, setRegisterPosition, setWasFormerRegister

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • logger

      private static final org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger

    • privateToMe

      private boolean privateToMe
      It shows if the current message is a direct message to the player itself, then the player won't see a [You] message, because he will receive it from the server and then display it.

    • chatWindow

      private com.jfoenix.controls.JFXTextArea chatWindow
      The textArea where the whole chat history gets displayed.

    • directChoiceBox

      private com.jfoenix.controls.JFXComboBox<java.lang.String> directChoiceBox
      The choiceBox where the user can choose if the message should be a direct message and who should be the receiver of the message (one or all).

    • messageField

      private com.jfoenix.controls.JFXTextField messageField
      The TextField which reads the message the player typed.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatController

      public ChatController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      In this method the directBox gets initialized and the chat controller gets assigned to viewClient. Also the lobbyTextArea recognizes if the enter key gets pressed and call the method submitChatMessage().

    • setTextArea

      public void setTextArea​(java.lang.String messageBody)
      The messages received from other users are printed in the chatTextArea and make a new line.
      Parameters:
      messageBody - the message which will get printed

    • addUser

      public void addUser​(Player player)
      This method displays an user who joined to the lobby with its chosen robot, name and also the name is added to the choiceBox so that other users in lobby can send direct messages.
      Parameters:
      player - that gets added

    • submitChatMessage

      private void submitChatMessage()
      This message gets called when the user presses enter, it reads the receiver (all or one person) from the comboBox and the message which gets filtered for instructions and everything gets send as the JSONMessage SendChat.

    • checkMessage

      private void checkMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      This message checks whether the typed message is either #emptySpam or #damageDecks or #damage x, depending to this it calls messages that change things on the client side.
      Parameters:
      message - the message which has to be checked

    • receivedChat

      public void receivedChat​(ReceivedChat receivedChat)
      This message displays a received message depending if it is direct or not in the chatWindow.
      Parameters:
      receivedChat - the receivedChat with sender and message

    • resetFocus

      private void resetFocus()
      This method resets the focus onto the infoLabel if the current controller is LobbyController or to the boardPane if current controller is GameController.# It gets called if the focus is set on the textField or textArea and the user clicks Enter.
